title: [Bug]: Auto-away is not working
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Whenever I go away from my computer, I will keep being shown as 'online' (green icon). My status only changes when I am in a meeting/call (red) or have an entry in the calendar that says 'working elsewhere' (icons turn dark green / dark red). I need to explicitly set my status to 'away' or 'offline' for people to see I am not at my computer.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.1 (I think, can't find it in the UI!)

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start Teams
2. Go away for a while
3. Check status from another account
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Status should at some point change to 'away' and preferably) mention how long I've been away
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

_No response_
